mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogmissing (missingId, memberID, dname, dKind, dgender, age, dmissingdate, city, gugun, detail, ddetail, posx, posy, missingContent, dmoney) VALUES (#{missingId}, #{memberID}, #{petname}, #{kind}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{whenis}, #{city}, #{country}, #{whereis}, #{kind_more}, #{posx}, #{posy}, #{story},#{reward})
INSERT INTO dogmissingPhoto (dmpId, missingId, filename) VALUES (dogmissingPhoto_seq.NEXTVAL, #{missingId}, #{filename})
